title: Flag: Nepal

adjectives: From or in the countryside or connected with it.
Of, from or pertaining to the countryside (adjective).
nouns: Emblem usually consisting of a rectangular piece of cloth of distinctive design
Piece of cloth.
A flag is a piece of fabric with a distinctive design that is used as a symbol, as a signaling device, or as decoration.
A piece of cloth, often decorated with an emblem, used as a visual signal or symbol.
Piece of fabric with a distinctive design
The national flag of Nepal is the world's only non-quadrilateral national flag.
The opposite of secession
As its original Latin term
Government
The collective body of a nation or state as politically organized, or as exercising political functions.
The territory of a nation, especially an independent nation state or formerly independent nation; a political entity asserting ultimate authority over a geographical area.

Nations is often used synonymously with ethnic group, but although ethnicity is now one of the most important aspects of cultural or social identity for the members of most nations, people with the same ethnic origin may live in different nation-states and be treated as members of separate nations for that reason.
Political organisation with a centralized independent government
The government.
An organized political community, living under a government
Nation has various meanings, and the meaning has changed over time.
A state is an organized community living under one government.
A political entity asserting ultimate authority over a geographical area.

A people permanently occupying a fixed territory bound together by common law, habits and custom into one body politic exercising, through the medium of an organized government, independent sovereignty and control over all persons and things within its boundaries, unless or until authority is ceded to a federation or union of other states.
The people who live in a nation or country
A politically organized body of people under a single government
A sovereign state.
A state is a nonphysical juridical entity of the international legal system that is represented by one centralized government that has supreme independent authority over a geographic area.
The geographic area under the control of a political state.
Country extant from 1768 to 2008
1768-2008 monarchy in Central Asia
A country in South Asia, located in the Himalaya between India and China (Tibet).
Official name of Nepal.
From its ISO-639 country code
Federal Democratic Republic of Nepal.
The Kingdom of Nepal was formed in 1768 by the unification of Nepal.
A country in South Asia between China and India. Official Name: Federal Democratic Republic of Nepal.
A small landlocked Asian country high in the Himalayas between India and China
Nepal, officially the Federal Democratic Republic of Nepal, is a landlocked country located in South Asia.

description: The flag for Nepal, which may show as the letters NP on some platforms.
apple_vendor_description: The unique flag of Nepal is meticulously recreated on Apple devices, showcasing its iconic crimson and blue pennants. Apple's detailed design brings out the crisp lines and vibrant colors, with glossy 3D shading lending a tactile quality to the fabric.  The soft rounded edges ensure a polished look that is instantly recognizable, representing the proud nation of Nepal, its geography, and its rich cultural identity in digital communications.
